meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #660.

td.p: Linda Dragas, a freelance journalist from North Bergen, New Jersey
Alan Rosenberg, a newspaper editor from Warwick, Rhode Island
Bob Verini, a playwright and actor from New York City, New York (whose 1-day cash winnings total $7,801)

tr.td: NUCLEAR PHYSICS
BOOKS & AUTHORS
HATS
TV UNCLES
RESORTS
IN OTHER WORDS...

div.h3: Scores at the first commercial break (after clue 11):

tr.td: Bob
Alan
Linda

div.h3: Scores at the end of the Jeopardy! Round:

tr.td: Bob
Alan
Linda
HISTORIC GEOGRAPHY
BUSINESS & INDUSTRY
"NEVER" & "EVER" SONGS
FAMOUS MAMMALS
IN THE OCEAN
II
(Alex: We refer to that as 2 or the second, as in Alexander Trebek the second. There was no first, it doesn't mean anything.
